infos.value: Even together, the two of them did not stand a chance...
Start begging for yer life! Tell me yer can't wait to bear me a son!
Do it...and yer might save your own skin.
Revolting? Me? Then yer can die with the rest o' them!
Thought I'd come unprepared? This is our second dance!
C-craven slugs! This isn't th' last o' me!
...I'll pay yer back in blood for this!
